data.name: Moon Corp. Tower Defense Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Quad Core AMD or Intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 660 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Quad Core AMD or Intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
